backend/main.mo: Main actor for the Rajat's Equation platform defining all data types (MathProblem, Booking, Sessions, Attendance, etc.) and including mixins for storage, authorization, Stripe, and HTTP outcalls.
backend/migration.mo: Handles state migration from OldPersistentState (with `classSessions` using OldClassSession) to NewPersistentState (with `sessions` using NewSession that adds optional meetingPlatform and meetingLink fields).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two features—admin meeting platform/link management in StudentDetailView and student-facing 'Join Class' button—to their implementing files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated summaries of all frontend source files, describing each component's purpose, key hooks, and notable implementation details for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including colors for background, foreground, charts, sidebar, and destructive states.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the PWA with title 'Rajat's Equation - Master Mathematical Thinking', PWA meta tags, manifest link, and the React root div.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest for 'Rajat's Equation - Mathematics Platform' specifying icons, theme colors, standalone display mode, and education/productivity categories.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy for static assets and bypassing caching for ICP API calls, with install/activate lifecycle handlers for cache management.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component that manages authentication state, admin checks, and view routing between home, admin dashboard, student portal, and other views using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Admin dashboard with a sidebar navigation providing access to tabs for booked students, attendance, support messages, enquiries, course materials, class sessions, discount codes, and visitor tracking.
frontend/src/components/AdminEnquiriesTa: Admin tab component that lists all student enquiries with expandable details, allowing admins to confirm or reject each enquiry and view associated QR tokens.
frontend/src/components/AdminSupportMess: Admin component that displays support messages grouped by student, with expandable threads and an inline reply form for responding to unreplied messages.
frontend/src/components/AttendanceManage: Admin component for marking student attendance by selecting a booking and recording present/absent status, with a view of recent attendance records for the selected student.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Wrapper component that intercepts click events to enforce authentication, showing a login modal for unauthenticated users and passing through or calling onAction for authenticated ones.
frontend/src/components/BookedStudentsSe: Displays a searchable list of booked students with status badges, and allows drilling into a detailed view for each student via StudentDetailView.
frontend/src/components/BookingConfirmat: Renders a confirmation screen after a booking is completed, showing all booking details including name, service, date/time, discount, and total amount.
frontend/src/components/BookingFlowManag: Manages a multi-step booking dialog flow (form → payment → confirmation) by coordinating BookingForm, UpiPaymentStep, and BookingConfirmation components.
frontend/src/components/BookingForm.tsx: A form component for collecting booking details (name, phone, service, class type, number of classes, date/time) and calculating the price before submission.
frontend/src/components/ClassSessionsMan: Admin component for managing course sessions per course, supporting adding new sessions with meet/calendar links and deleting existing ones, sorted by date.
frontend/src/components/CompletedSession: Displays a list of all completed tutoring bookings fetched from the backend, showing student details, session info, and optional access codes.
frontend/src/components/CourseMaterialsM: Admin component for managing course materials (PDFs, videos, notes, links) per course, supporting add and delete operations via React Query mutations with a course selector dropdown and inline form.
frontend/src/components/CourseOffering.t: Displays a course details card with pricing and an enrollment button, and handles UPI payment submission via a dialog that records the transaction reference ID.
frontend/src/components/DiscountCodeMana: Admin panel component for viewing hardcoded and backend-fetched discount codes, generating new codes locally, copying them to clipboard, and deactivating existing codes.
frontend/src/components/EnrollmentCTA.ts: Marketing section component that displays enrollment benefits, WhatsApp/YouTube links, and a booking flow dialog to encourage students to join Rajat's Equation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer component with brand info, quick navigation links, contact details, and a Caffeine.ai attribution badge.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky navigation header with logo, desktop/mobile nav links, login/logout controls, and admin-aware routing using Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Landing page hero section with math-themed visuals, call-to-action buttons for booking sessions and enquiries, and role-based navigation links for students and admins.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Standalone button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, showing appropriate icons and loading state.
frontend/src/components/LoginModal.tsx: Modal dialog prompting unauthenticated users to sign in via Internet Identity, with a loading state and a dismiss option.
frontend/src/components/PaymentEnquiryFo: Form for submitting payment enquiries with fee type, amount, and duration fields; on success it displays a generated reference ID and a UPI QR code for payment.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Onboarding form that collects a new user's name and saves their profile via a mutation hook to initialize their account.
frontend/src/components/QRCheckInView.ts: QR code check-in interface supporting both camera scanning and manual token entry, with token validation and confirmation steps for student session attendance.
frontend/src/components/Services.tsx: Displays a grid of math course cards with group and one-to-one pricing, and provides buttons to open a booking flow dialog or a payment enquiry form.
frontend/src/components/StudentAttendanc: Shows a student's attendance records and summary (total, present, percentage with progress bar) for the last 90 days, fetched via query hooks.
frontend/src/components/StudentDashboard: Authenticated student dashboard displaying assigned sessions and learning materials in tabs, with a login prompt for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/StudentDetailVie: Admin-facing detail view for a specific student that allows adding/deleting sessions and materials, and managing meeting links per session.
frontend/src/components/StudentEnquiryFo: Form for students to submit a course enquiry; on success it displays and allows copying the generated enquiry ID.
frontend/src/components/StudentEnquiryPo: Portal where students can look up their enquiry status by ID, displaying a status badge (pending, confirmed, or rejected) with relevant details.
frontend/src/components/StudentMaterials: Displays a list of course materials (PDF, video, note, link) for a student with the ability to add new materials via a form and delete existing ones, using React Query mutations and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/StudentPortal.ts: Renders a student-facing portal that requires an access code to authenticate, then shows tabbed views for materials, schedule, support messages, and attendance using the verified booking data.
frontend/src/components/StudentScheduleT: Manages a student's session schedule, allowing adding and deleting sessions and inline editing of meeting links (Google Meet, Zoom, Zoho) with platform-colored badges and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/StudentSupportVi: Provides a messaging interface where students can send support messages to their instructor and view threaded replies with timestamps, using React Query for fetching and submitting messages.
frontend/src/components/UpiPaymentStep.t: Implements a UPI payment step with discount code validation, dynamic QR code generation, UPI deep-link for mobile, and a copy-to-clipboard UPI ID feature, calling onConfirm with the final discounted amount.
frontend/src/components/VisitorTrackingV: Admin UI component that displays visitor activity stats (total bookings, login events, course views) with a placeholder activity log, noting that a backend `getAllVisitorActivities` endpoint is needed for full functionality.
frontend/src/config/razorpay.ts: Empty file intended for Razorpay payment gateway configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, initializing admin access control and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBooking.ts: Provides `useAddBookingRecord` and `useGetBookingRecords` hooks for creating and fetching booking records via the ICP actor, with React Query cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInstallPrompt.ts: Hook that manages PWA install prompt state, exposing `canInstall`, `isInstalled`, and an `installApp` function that triggers the browser's native install dialog.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication via DFINITY's AuthClient, providing a React context and provider with login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Central collection of React Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profiles, admin checks, booking records (CRUD), and meeting/schedule management via the ICP actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRazorpay.ts: Empty file intended for a Razorpay integration hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining the design system with Tailwind, custom CSS variables for navy/gold/cream color palette (light and dark modes), typography using Playfair Display and Inter fonts, and fixes for Radix UI overlay opacity.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/src/types/booking.ts: TypeScript type definitions for booking-related data structures: form input (`BookingFormData`), stored records (`BookingRecord`), and UPI payment parameters (`UpiPaymentParams`).
frontend/src/utils/pricingCalculator.ts: Utility module defining per-class prices for one-on-one and group sessions, volume discount tiers, and functions to calculate final booking prices with discounts applied.
frontend/src/utils/upiPayment.ts: Provides utilities for generating UPI deep link URLs for payments to a fixed UPI ID, and a helper to detect mobile devices.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence and hash cleanup helpers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom CSS-variable-based colors, serif/sans font families, border radii, box shadows, and enabling animate, typography, and container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state (version 3) for 'Rajat's Equation', listing existing features and pending feature requests around adding meeting platform/link support to admin and student portal sessions.
